Package modules.control

Class TicketingController

  • java.lang.Object
    • modules.control.BaseController
      • modules.control.TicketingController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeneralEnter
    public class TicketingController
extends BaseController
implements GeneralEnter
    Represents a type of controller that is able to make booking according to the user's request

        mv - the movie chosen by the user
        ci - the cineplex chosen by the user

        Returns:

      • checkTicketType

        private TicketType checkTicketType​(java.lang.String code,
                                   int cat)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        function to check the type of a ticket
        Parameters:
        code - the three-character code which is based on the day of the show e.g. Tue; Pub for public holiday
        cat - the user-entered aga category. 1 for senior citizen, 2 for student, and 3 for none
        Returns:
        the type of a ticket
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Occurs when not suitable ticket type was found

      • checkCode

        private java.lang.String checkCode​(java.lang.String date)
                            throws java.lang.Exception
        function to check which day the show will be on
        Parameters:
        date - the date of the show to be checked e.g. 11/12/2019
        Returns:
        a three-character code. e.g. Tue; Pub for public holiday
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Occurs when the passed in date cannot be parsed properly
